interpretation:
The "coconut" card represents a sense of protection and a need for self-preservation. It signifies the importance of creating a safe and secure environment for yourself. The tough exterior of the coconut symbolizes the need for boundaries and a strong sense of self-protection. The nourishing and hydrating properties of the fruit inside represent the importance of self-care and taking care of one's physical and emotional needs.

In a reading, this card may indicate the need to establish healthy boundaries in relationships or situations that may be draining. It may also suggest the importance of taking care of oneself and prioritizing self-care. The "coconut" card encourages you to create a safe and secure environment for yourself in all areas of your life. Trust your instincts and protect yourself from any potential harm or negative influences.
